mods.abstract: President Brother Bernard LoCoco presents a certificate to Marguerite Piazza, Memphis-based opera singer and supporter of Christian Brothers College, at a President's Club meeting. Behind them was Brother Stephen O'Malley in the center and Breen Bland behind Miss Piazza.
